definition: A term used to refer to a written or printed heading or caption that introduces or summarizes a piece of work, such as a book, article, or document. It is commonly used to denote the name or title of a publication, as well as the heading of a chapter or section within a larger work.

examples.german: Der Titel des Buches lautet 'Die Verwandlung'.
examples.english: The title of the book is 'The Metamorphosis'.
She has been awarded the title of 'Professor'.

examples.german: Der Titel des Films ist 'Der Pate'.
examples.english: The title of the movie is 'The Godfather'.
He holds the title of 'World Champion'.
The title of the song is 'Imagine'.
